lead_paragraph: GROTH--Joseph C.,JR., 86, beloved husband of Nancy Flynn Groth since 1969, died March 21st in Santa Monica, CA. Online memorial at www. treasuryofpersonhood.com 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  GROTH, JOSEPH C.
